modName: UNP Reaper9111s Witch of the Wild Outfit
summary: Adds UNP meshes of Reaper9111's Witch of the Wild Outfit, Now includes StandAlone version
descriptionHtml:
Heres a link to Reaper9111's original Witch of the Wild Outfit MOD (fits CBBE).
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25799

Changelog
================
1.3A2 - Added armour rating (leather equivalent) Only works with 1.3, mistakes should be fixed now (sorry for any inconvenience).

1.3A - Added armour rating (leather equivalent) Only works with 1.3 (removed from downloads because I made a mistake on the ESP).

1.3 - Added an All in One StandAlone version (contains V1.1 & V1.2 merged, textures and a new ESP that will NOT conflict with reaper9111's original mod) This means you can have both CBBE and UNP versions active at the same time.

1.2 - Fixes boots clipping on UNP body (tested this time)

1.1 - Boot clipping fix & weird skin texture fix (hopefully) The robes should look more like the original now too.

IMPORTANT NOTE (ignore if you are using V1.3 Standalone)
================
You will need to download Reaper9111's Witch of the Wild Outfit MOD in order for this MOD to work (see install info below).

The ESP I used and the one from Reapers mod share the same CK setup and item codes. Everything should be in the same crafting sections etc, BUT there will likely be problems if you activate both my ESP and Reaper9111's ESP AT THE SAME TIME! Please follow the install instructions on this page carefully.

Info about the mod
V1.3
================
Ive been thinking, what if someone has 2 different body types in the game at one time? (for exmample PC has UNP and some NPCs have CBBE or the otherway round) so as of version 1.3 this mod is standalone this means you can have both CBBE and UNP versions active at the same time. (assuming you have Reaper9111's mod active alongside mine).

The item names have changed for the UNP versions of the gear, basicly I have added 'UNP' into each item name right before the last word.
So instead of 'Witch of the Wild Robes' it will be 'Witch of the Wild UNP Robes' for the UNP version.

V1.0 - V1.2
================
Adds UNP meshes of Reaper9111's Witch of the Wild outfit, I edited his ESP so everything should be the same with the exception of the meshes.

ALL versions
================
To get the items ingame you can either craft them (details below) or use the console.
To find the item codes, simply type into the console 'help "witch of the wild"' and it will list the items with the codes along side them.
Then use 'player.additem (insert item code here) (insert desired amount here)'

Description (from reaper9111's mod page)
===========
This mod add to the "leather" section of "Any Forge" 6 new items... (All Items are Clothes, so have no armor rating) Feel Free to convert the Outfit to Armor, as long as my mod is required, Send me a link, I'll upload it here.
- Witch of the Wild Horns (Circlet)
- Witch of the Wild Amulet
- Witch of the Wild Robe
- Witch of the Wild Bracers
- Witch of the Wild Ring
- Witch of the Wild Boots
The Textures are all 100% custom made by myself.
This my "First" official 100% New textures release... Don't be too harsh on me ;-)
I hope you will like them and endorse it i you do !
This outfit is for CBBE and are for female only ! (it can probably work also with UNP)
It's a mashup of this and that as for the model...
Beast race can use it, but it's possible that the horns will not display correctly. (the rest should be fine)
Most of these items require only materials only, No perks and such. (Silver ingot, Leather, Leather Staps, Charcoal, Ruby, Horker's Tusk)
Please note that the boots & robe "Inventory model" are not looking good, but at least it has some !

PLEASE, FEEL FREE TO UPLOAD GOOD SCREENSHOT, i'm not good at taking great screen !

Install (1.3A2)
============================
*This is an optional version of the 1.3 StandAlone ESP which adds armour rating and tempering to the set.*
- Install 1.3 StandAlone as per instructions below
- Install the optional ESP using NMM or extract the files to your Skyrim directory
- Activate "UNP Reaper's Witch of the Wild Armour.ESP" in your load order
- Launch game and enjoy.

* Note.. the ESP from the StandAlone version does the same stuff as the optional ESP only with out the armour rating and tempering, you can use both ESP at the same time but they will work separately too*


Install (1.3 StandAlone)
============================
- If you have any previous versions of this mod, please remove/delete them before installing the 1.3 Standalone version
- Simply install using NMM - or - Extract to your skyrim directory (overwrite when asked)
- Activate the 'UNP Reaper's Witch of the Wild Outfit' ESP in your loadorder
- Launch game and enjoy.

Install (V1.0 - V1.2)
============================
Please follow this carefully, first of all.
- Download Reaper9111's 'Witch of the Wild' MOD - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25799
- Install his mod as it says on his mod page

- Before you begin this next part, make sure that the ESP that came with Reaper9111's Outfit MOD IS NOT ACTIVE
You want his mod installed but his ESP unticked in your load order, once thats done we can continue.

- Download my MOD & install using NMM
- Download & install the 1.2 update using NMM (when prompted to replace click no, when prompted to overwrite old files click yes)
- Activate the 'UNP Reapers Witch of the Wild Outfit' ESP (tick in load order list)
- Launch the game and enjoy.

Permissions
=====================
This is not my Mod I just converted it to UNP, please direct any permission requests to the original authors mod page. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25799

Credits
=====================
Bethesda
Nexus
Gimp
Nifskope
Nexus Modding community
Reaper9111 for all the Textures and for his permission to edit this file
Fraper for the Boots model
Kurese for the horn model
Unknown Author, mentioned in the credits of Reaper9111's Mod
